thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start by listing the files in the current directory to get an idea of what we have available to work with.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the current directory will give us an idea of what files we have available to work with. This can help us determine what tasks we can accomplish and what resources we have available.
thoughts.plan:
- List the files in the current directory using the 'list_files' command
- Review the list of files to determine what resources we have available
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to get bogged down in reviewing the list of files and instead focus on identifying what resources are available to me.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory and review the list to determine what resources we have available.
